title: Projects
text:
Publications
Saini, A. K., Hernandez, J. G., Wong, E. F., Misra, D., and Moore, J. H. Evolved Sample Weights for Bias Mitigation: Effectiveness Depends on Optimization Objectives
üìÑ Preprint: arXiv:2511.20909

A multi-objective optimization approach that balances predictive accuracy with fairness metrics across diverse datasets, using sample-weight evolution and computationally efficient optimization techniques.
In submission to the ACM Journal of Responsible Computing (JRC).

title: About
text:
What I‚Äôm Working On
I enjoy applying statistical thinking and machine learning to real-world problems. My recent work focuses on:

Using data and algorithms responsibly, with attention to fairness and bias

Exploring optimization ideas that balance performance and efficiency

Building tools and workflows that make complex models more interpretable and usable
